module.name: colissimo_simplicite
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: skrill
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: paypal
module.description: Benefit from PayPal's complete payment platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Benefit from PayPal's complete payment platform and grow your business online, on mobile and internationally . Your customers can pay with a selection of local and international debit and credit cards. Make online payments simple. PayPal customers can buy from you quickly if they use One Touch™  With more than 200 million active account holders, PayPal is a truly global payments platform that is available to people in more than 200 markets.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Boxtal Shipping - pick up, door to door, express
module.description: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts.
module.additional_description: 1. IMPROVE YOUR CONVERSION RATESGive a choice between different shipping options which suit best your clients : pick up stations (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, etc.), standard (Colissimo, Happy-Post, etc.), express (Chronopost, FedEx, DHL Express, UPS, TNT Express, etc.). 2. REDUCE YOUR SHIPPING COSTSSave up to 75% on your shipping costs with the best shipping services without commitments or any contracts. 3. SAVE TIME ON MANAGING YOUR SHIPMENTSPrint shipping labels directly from your PrestaShop back-office. Track, cancel or reschedule your orders in one place. One single invoice for all shipping services. 4. ACCELERATE YOUR WEBSITE LAUNCH One single plugin to manage all your shipments. Boxtal is your only contact before, during and after delivery, whatever carriers were selected. Save time and focus on the essential of your business.

module.name: fianetfraud
module.description: With Certissim, secure your sales and control your outstanding payments ! E-merchants, you are the first victims of Internet fraud. Fraud transactions are the source of financial losses
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With Certissim, secure your sales and control your outstanding payments ! E-merchants, you are the first victims of Internet fraud. Fraud transactions are the source of financial losses. Enjoy the power of Certissim system: 3.5 billion euros in revenue and 20 million transactions analyzed in 2010. *
module.additional_description: Your shop is version 1.5 or 1.6? This module is already pre-installed and ready for use! To activate it, go to the "Modules" tab in your back office and click Install. This module is available for France.

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines.
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: iziflux
module.description: Service not yet available in english, coming soon
module.author: Profileo
module.description_full: Service not yet available in english, coming soon
module.additional_description: Service not yet available in english, coming soon

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: payplug
module.description: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With PayPlug, online payment has never been so easy. Our online payment solution can be used with or without a merchant account and can be installed with just a few clicks.
module.additional_description: Our modern and intuitive solution allows you to improve your conversion rate with our functions and ergonomics specifically designed for e-commerce. Thanks to PayPlug, you can simplify your online payments and no longer lose out on sales:Quick payment without registrationModern and sleek designAutomatic detection of card type

module.description_full: Adds a block with your store's forecast.

module.description: Adds a block with a table of your latest orders and a ranking of your products

module.description_full: Adds a block with a table of your latest orders and a ranking of your products.

module.description_full: Adds a block with a graphical representation of the development of your store(s) based on selected key data.

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.name: gridhtml
module.description: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows the PrestaShop statistics pages to display data in a grid. It is required by statistics modules.

module.name: pagesnotfound
module.description: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: sekeywords
module.description: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays which keywords have led visitors to your website.

module.name: rees46
module.description: A full suite of interconnected tools to turn visitors into customers, recover abandoned carts, reactivate and retain customers, and gain full control over online store growth
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A full suite of interconnected tools to turn visitors into customers, recover abandoned carts, reactivate and retain customers, and gain full control over online store growth.
module.additional_description: Set up REES46 once and manage all the necessary instruments with just one click.Increase revenue and customer engage.Reduce abandoned carts, reactivate 'sleeping' customers with personal offers.Analyse how things going on.

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SMB Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: paygreen
module.description: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.additional_description: This payment module allows you to customize your payment page:Your payment page with your colorsOccasionally organize fundraising operations for organizations of your choiceEnable / Disable 3D secure systemSubmit a recurring payment to your customers Our pricing is based on your monthly sales volume : PayGreen is one of the most economical solutions on the market. Our pricing fits your monthly turnover.

module.name: ewayrapid
module.description: Securely accept credit card payments, as well as PayPal and MasterPass by MasterCard wih eWAY. eWAY is available in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Hong Kong and Malaysia
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Securely accept credit card payments, as well as PayPal and MasterPass by MasterCard wih eWAY. eWAY is available in Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, Hong Kong and Malaysia.
module.additional_description: Securely accept card payments from your PrestaShop store - customers enter their card details in your store and the data is sent directly to eWAY for processing.Increase checkout completion by offering multiple payment options: credit card, PayPal and MasterPass by MasterCard.Works with eWAY's anti-fraud technologies to help smash fraud.Test your store out with the eWAY Sandbox

module.name: payolution
module.description: Since 2011 payolution offers innovative solutions for invoicing and installments in the entire DACH region
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Since 2011 payolution offers innovative solutions for invoicing and installments in the entire DACH region. As a white label provider we operate in the background what enables the merchant to strengthen the trust between himself and his customers.
module.additional_description: 1. Increased sales and revenue 2. Higher conversion rate 3. More returning customers 4. 100% risk free & guarateed payout

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Pay makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Pay can help merchants add new customers increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business.  Sign-up now! Start offering Amazon Pay to your customers NOW and receive our lowest service fees* in the UK through 30 November 2017, PLUS no services fees* in December. Learn more. * The Service Fees waived during the period are Processing Fees and Authorisation Fees.
module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.name: heidelpay
module.description: With the heidelpay-module you are able to accept transactions worldwide. These payment methods are available for E-COM, M-COM and the POS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With the heidelpay-module you are able to accept transactions worldwide. These payment methods are available for E-COM, M-COM and the POS.
module.additional_description: Because of its lean and frictionless checkout processes the module gives an absolute secure feeling to your customers while the payment process and reduces this way purchase demolitions and increases your conversion rates.With the heidelpay-module you are able to:offer all payment methods with only one single partnerachieve new target groupsachieve more customers altogetherincrease your revenue, by offering always the right payment method The module supports the following payment methods:Credit CardsDebit CardsDirect DebitInvoice (with service of transaction guarantee)PayPalSofortüberweisungiDealPay in advancemore payment options available on requestPlease find more Information and detailed instructions for registration here

module.name: blockreassurance
module.description: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an information block aimed at offering helpful information to reassure customers that your store is trustworthy.

module.name: ps_banner
module.description: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a banner on your shop. ​With the default theme Classic, it appears at the bottom of the homepage.
module.additional_description: ​Use this space to promote your seasonal offers or some important section of your shop!

module.name: ps_categorytree
module.description: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows the current category and subcategories in a block on the left column of your shop. ​It is useful to navigate the category pages and visualize the subcategories.
module.additional_description: ​Makes it easier for your customer to navigate your shop and see available subcategories.

module.name: ps_contactinfo
module.description: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Add contact information in the header and footer of your store.In the header: either the "Call us" information or a "Contact us" link (redirecting to the contact page)In the footer: your shop's name, address and contact information
module.additional_description: Contact information is essential for a shop as it is part of what reassure the customers. Visitors will know they can join you through the medium of their choice, so do not hesitate to provide your contact details if you want your customers to reach you!

module.name: ps_customersignin
module.description: Adds a block that displays information about the customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block that displays information about the customer.

module.name: ps_customtext
module.description: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display custom blocks of rich text in one zone, usually on the homepage. Thanks to hooks, you can display this block anywhere in your shop. For instance, you can use this block of text to make a short presentation of your brand on your homepage.
module.additional_description: ​By providing information to your customers, this block of text can help you both in your content strategy and your search engine optimization.

module.name: ps_emailsubscription
module.description: Adds a form for newsletter subscription
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a form for newsletter subscription.

module.name: ps_featuredproducts
module.description: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage. With this module, you can choose which products to highlight by placing them on your homepage.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales by displaying new products, promotions or product selections directly on your homepage. Enhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage

module.name: ps_imageslider
module.description: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module adds a slider block on your homepage's central column, where you can define a set of images that will be displayed one after the other, with a sliding motion.
module.additional_description: Increase the visibility of chosen products or offersEnhance customer experience by displaying a lively homepage with a professional look

module.name: ps_mainmenu
module.description: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a new menu to the top of your e-commerce website.

module.name: ps_sharebuttons
module.description: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays social media sharing buttons (Twitter, Facebook, Google+ and Pinterest) on every product page.

module.name: ps_socialfollow
module.description: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Allows you to add information about your brand's social networking accounts.

module.name: welcome
module.description: Help the user to create his first product
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Help the user to create his first product.

module.name: etranslation
module.description: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 9 out of 10 internet users prefer browsing sites in their native language. Don't miss the Cross-Border train! Invest in an optimised translation  and make the most of our native translators and automatic content export and translation import tools
module.additional_description: Translation by qualified, native translators who are e-commerce specialistsA made-to-measure, personalised service. We are not a translation platform                                                                                                                               The most reasonable rates, thanks to our free repetition policy (an average of 20 to 35% of an e-commerce site is repeated)Automated content export and translation import

module.name: ps_legalcompliance
module.description: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module helps merchants comply with applicable e-commerce laws.

module.name: ps_checkpayment
module.description: This module allows you to accept payments by check
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to accept payments by check.

module.name: ps_currencyselector
module.description: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows a currency selector in the header of your shop when several currencies are available to a customer.
module.additional_description: Facilitate cross-border sales by making it possible to choose the currency in which customers want to pay.

module.name: ps_customeraccountlinks
module.description: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block with links relative to a user's account.

module.name: ps_facetedsearch
module.description: Displays a block allowing multiple filters
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays a block allowing multiple filters.

module.name: ps_languageselector
module.description: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block allowing customers to select a language for your store's content.

module.name: ps_searchbar
module.description: Adds a quick search field to your website
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a quick search field to your website.

module.name: ps_shoppingcart
module.description: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The cart summary is an essential step before closing a sale. This module adds a block with the customer's cart content. It displays the number of products in the cart, with a summary, and acts as an entry point to the checkout.
module.additional_description: ​Remind your customer what they are about to purchase.

module.name: ps_wirepayment
module.description: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept payments by bank transfer. Your customers will be able to pay their orders by wire payment. At the last step of the checkout, it will indicate to which account the payment should be transferred. This information will also be sent together with the confirmation email. The order will not be validated right away. You will have to change its status to "Payment received" when you actually received the payment.
module.additional_description: Adds an additional payment method to provide more flexibility to your customers.

module.name: bablic
module.description: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Translate your PrestaShop store in minutes, no coding required, just use our user-friendly, visual editor. Choose from machine-translation, manual translation (do it yourself) or order professional human translation with just a click!
module.additional_description: Reach new customers globally in a matter of minutes & increase salesManually edit translations, replace images, fix style issues with just a click in our visual editorImmediately compete with the big guys using your fully localized PrestaShop store

module.name: chargeback
module.description: The Chargeback App is a dispute management platform that helps you reduce revenue lost to disputes. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Chargeback App is a dispute management platform that helps you reduce revenue lost to disputes. Works with Stripe, PayPal, Authorize.net, First Data, WorldPay, Braintree and others to simplify chargebacks & friendly fraud.
module.additional_description: Consolidate all of your PrestaShop, payment gateway and merchant account data into a single platformQuickly respond to disputes with a full understanding of the orders status and dispute stageImprove dispute management and minimize lost revenue with expert support and guidance We know your goal is to maximize revenue, that’s why we created the Chargeback App. This dispute management platform picks up the ball where fraud scoring and manual reviews stop, enabling you to efficiently minimize lost revenue and increase profit. Identifying and gathering the data required to respond to a single dispute often requires logging into three separate systems, your storefront, payment gateway and merchant account processor. By consolidating the data from each, the Chargeback App helps you quickly take action like canceling an order and issuing a refund, or crafting a detailed document that adheres to the operating rules and regulations at Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Discover. The Chargeback App provides expert guidance and support at every stage of the dispute lifecycle to ensure you protect your revenue.

module.name: wirecardceecheckoutseamless
module.description: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrate all the payment methods you need into your online shop quickly and without any red tape.
module.additional_description: As a merchant based in Europe, offer your customers all over the world the opportunity to pay securely and conveniently at your online shop.  All standard payment methods (card payment, alternative methods incl. purchase on account with payment guarantee)Simple integrationAdditional premium servicesComprehensive support (via email, live chat, telephone)For merchants of all sizes and across all industriesIncluding fraud preventionPersonal merchant loginDetailed reportingOne interface for all payment methodsSolutions for your point of sale (POS, mPOS9)All the benefits of Wirecard AG (risk management, full banking licence, PCI certification)

module.name: ps_linklist
module.description: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Display links to your static pages (CMS and more) in left or right blocks in your shop's columns. You can configure this module with the "Link Widget" page from the Design section.
module.additional_description: ​Give more visibility to your pages, where you want and when you want.

module.name: sendcloud
module.description: SendCloud helps to grow your online store by optimizing the shipping process
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendCloud helps to grow your online store by optimizing the shipping process. Shipping packages has never been that easy!
module.additional_description: SendCloud is the smart shipping tool for e-commerce. With SendCloud you can easily print shipping labels in one click and ship packages with multiple carriers like DHL, DPD, UPS, Bpost, PostNL, Colissimo and many more. Time-saving shipping toolWith SendCloud you can optimize your entire shipping process. From importing orders, printing shipping labels, sending personalized tracking mails to managing returns, you can automate every step in your shipping process.  Offer multiple delivery options and increase conversionResearch has shown that 67% of customers leave an online store during the checkout process. That’s why it’s important to offer multiple delivery options that fit your customers’ needs. Reduce shipping costs

module.name: ps_emailalerts
module.description: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module allows you to send e-mail notifications to customers and receive notifications regarding stock and order modifications.
module.additional_description: Optimize your stock management and order processing by receiving alerts when:a new order is placed in your shopa product's stock is below a certain thresholda product's coverage is below a certain number of daysIncrease your sales by giving your customer the option to receive a notification when an out-of-stock product is available again

module.name: ps_advertising
module.description: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds an advertisement block to selected sections of your e-commerce website. It lets you add some advertisement on your shop. You can choose to advertize some specific section of your shop, some seasonal offers, or use this space for other advertising purposes.
module.additional_description: Your own advertising space with your own rules.

module.name: ps_bestsellers
module.description: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your store's top-selling products. The module adds a list of top-selling products at the bottom of your homepage, and creates a page dedicated to your top sellers.
module.additional_description: Showcase your top-selling products to boost your sales.

module.name: ps_categoryproducts
module.description: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block on the product page that displays products from the same category.

module.name: ps_productinfo
module.description: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Shows information on a product page: how many people are viewing it, the last time it was sold and the last time it was added to a cart.

module.name: miwo
module.description: Miwo is a brand new way to increase your chances of conversion while reducing cart abandonment

module.description_full: Miwo is a brand new way to increase your chances of conversion while reducing cart abandonment.
module.additional_description: You simply need a Miwo E-commerce account to fully take advantage of the features of this module! (Introductory offer: 120 days FREE trial - cancel anytime) Register for free directly inside the Miwo module. Benefits:Acquire new customersOffers a brand new way to retain your customersEncourages your visitors to return to your site without intrusive advertising or e-mailing campaignsIncreases your chances of conversionEnables acquisition of new mobile customersIncreases product visibility (sharing on Facebook, Twitter, Email and SMS)Find out the number of products your customers are interested in and their purchase intentSend them benefits directly in their mobile and measure the impact on sales in real-time.

module.description: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a "Customers who bought this product also bought..." section to every product page.

module.name: ps_dataprivacy
module.description: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adds a block displaying your data privacy policy in customer account creation forms. Activate it for more transparency and reassurance.
module.additional_description: Be transparent with your customers by telling them exactly what you do (and don't) with their private data.

module.name: ps_feeder
module.description: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module generates a RSS feed for your latest products. A RSS feed is a website content syndication format, which enables anyone to display the latest content from a website on another. In case of a multistore installation, you can display the new products from one shop, right in the sidebar of another of your shop using its RSS Feed Block module. If you would rather not have your content be available to anyone online, disable this module.
module.additional_description: Increase your sales: with this module, loyal customers will be able to get regular updates about products added to your catalog, by adding this feed to their own feed reader, without the need to subscribe to your newsletterImprove your SEO: search engines may use it to discover your new contentIncrease traffic: other websites will be able to display your new products on their page

module.name: ps_reminder
module.description: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Follow-up with your customers with daily customized e-mails. This module enables you to create e-mail alerts for your customers. It gives you a way to automatically send discount vouchers to some of your customers.
module.additional_description: Recapture lost sales with reminders on canceled cartsIncrease customer loyalty by sending vouchers to a customer that reaches a given amount of ordersIncentivize re-purchase by sending vouchers to who customer who only ordered once and did not come back to your siteReward first-time customers by sending them a voucher after their first validated order

module.name: digitaleo
module.description: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients. Test it and enjoy 10 000 emails and 100 free SMS!
module.additional_description: Thanks to Digitaleo: -          Save time thanks to the contact synchronization between Prestashop and Digitaleo-          Segment your contacts and easily create lists to communicate in a more focused and relevant way-          Send high quality and responsive emails thanks to the huge variety of templates one can customize-          Increase your customer loyalty by sending them personalized messages-          Generate more traffic to your website by informing your current and potential clients about promotions or new products-          Simplify  your tasks by programming the date and time you want to send in your emails-          Optimise your marketing campaigns by accessing your detailed statistics-          Ensuring an optimised deliver ratio in your emails and SMS-          Enjoy a technical support expert in your activity sector

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: comnpay
module.description: Cash your credit card payments on your e-commerce site with the ComNpay payment module. Simple and secure solution. The Distance Selling contract included
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cash your credit card payments on your e-commerce site with the ComNpay payment module. Simple and secure solution. The Distance Selling contract included.
module.additional_description: Simplifying your online paymentsCashing of main means of paymentEffective anti-fraud devices

module.name: oct8ne
module.description: Help your customers by showing them images and videos of your products using the coviewer to help them along in the decision making process
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Help your customers by showing them images and videos of your products using the coviewer to help them along in the decision making process.
module.additional_description: What does this module brings you? - Real time interaction with your customers- Displays images and videos of your products by chat or by phone- Predict and detect the best time to talk with your visitors- Between 15% and 20% of customers served through Oct8ne end up buying- 70% of clients attended- Reduces cart abandonment by 1/3- Increases average purchase price by 60% Features - Image and video coviewer- Attend your customers from your Smartphone- Predicting customer behavior- Customize the chat box and all messages- Visitor's contextual information- Add products to customer's cart- Mobile phone integration- Real time catalog integration- Management of departments- Common answers- Statistics of sessions, products and carts- Support for multiple stores or websites

module.name: genei
module.description: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With our module, you can export prestashop oders to Genei ships in seconds!. Gives your Prestashop a new feature of saving shiping costs. Try now, is free! We make more than 3000 ships per day!
module.additional_description: Merchants will save a lot of money using a online price-compare solution with many years of experience, and they can adjust price of products with more benefit margin.

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.name: adroll
module.description: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers.
module.additional_description: On average, only 96-98% of e-commerce store visitors leave before completing a purchase. AdRoll retargeting helps you reach those lost visitors personalized product recommendation ads across devices on the Web, Email, Facebook and Instagram. Our PrestaShop customers average a 7x ROI when using AdRoll: For every $10 spent, they see $70 in attributable revenue to AdRoll! This PrestaShop module streamlines the onboarding experience with AdRoll so you can start driving more sales faster! In just a few clicks, your store will be set up with the AdRoll pixel, essential audience segments, ROI/revenue tracking, and your synchronized product catalog for dynamic product recommendation ads. Other benefits:Use AdRoll to attract new visitors and retarget existing visitors across the web, mobile and Facebook.Make more sales and solve shopping cart abandonment like our 25,000+ customers.No minimums.Customer Support via Email, Chat & Phone.We'll even give you free ads!

module.name: cloudswipe
module.description: The Best Hosted Payment Page - looks EXACTLY like the rest of your site! Connects to 170+ payment gateways including AuthorizeNet, PayPal, and Stripe. No other payment modules needed
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Best Hosted Payment Page - looks EXACTLY like the rest of your site! Connects to 170+ payment gateways including AuthorizeNet, PayPal, and Stripe. No other payment modules needed.
module.additional_description: Security: The most secure way to collect payments onlineSimplicity: The easiest way to make your site PCI compliant.Savings: No need to buy other payment gateway add-ons. 150+ gateways included for free. No SSL required. CloudSwipe skins your hosted payment page with your PrestaShop theme so it looks exactly like the rest of your website. The most customizable, easiest to use, hosted payment page ever. You get:All the security for PCI compliant paymentsA secure payment page that looks exactly like the rest of your websiteSupport for over 150 payment gatewaysHappy customers confident in your securityPeace of mind You do NOT need:To buy a payment gateway module (150+ gateways are already integrated)Your own SSL certificate (payments are secured with SSL)To worry about security (we handle it for you)

module.name: cleverreach
module.displayName: CleverReach® - Newsletter Marketing for your PrestaShop
module.description: Spotify, Levi’s, DHL and BMW create & send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? – It’s email marketing made easier
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Levi’s, DHL and BMW create & send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? – It’s email marketing made easier. Benefit from our efficient software & flexible pricing without a contract term – with your PrestaShop.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble. At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data: Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit. Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort. Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email. CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 160,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account

module.name: upela
module.description: Deliver your clients’ orders using a urgent, express or economic service
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Deliver your clients’ orders using a urgent, express or economic service.Ship within your country and beyond! (More than 220 destinations available)Without subscription, save money with Upela and enjoy a quality service.
module.additional_description: With Upela it has never been so easy for e-merchants and SMEs to ship. Upela displays only the best shipping offers, at the best price and always with the best quality of service.The UPELA shipping module facilitates access to: - door-to-door deliveries and dropoff services - professional automation tools reducing your daily workload With Upela keep your customers informed in real time about their delivery status.Take advantage of the best offers from reliable carriers while using an integrated tool that will make your shipping management much easier!Improve the quality of your delivery services and keep your customers coming back!

module.description_full: ratenkauf by easyCredit is the easiest and fastest installment payment solution of Germany. Join today to get the simplest way of partial payment for your POS and E-Commerce.
module.additional_description: Easy– effortless installation of the pluginFair – simple and transparent easyCredit-processesSpeed – instant feedback on credit enquiryHigh-selling – generate higher sales through a bigger cart valueAssured – credit risk secured by easyCredit (solvency risk)Secure – Maximum security for customer and payment dataProfitable – less order terminations due to no media disruption

module.description: Rapid check the design of your website on real devicesTesting Digital takes screenshots of each of your pages on each of the configurations you have set (browsers, OS, devices model/maker) with a sing
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Rapid check the design of your website on real devicesTesting Digital takes screenshots of each of your pages on each of the configurations you have set (browsers, OS, devices model/maker) with a single click.
module.additional_description: Get screenshots of your pages.Test on real devices.Boost your ROI. Facilitates conversion.Secure your business with a quality website.Optimizes the purchase tunnel and improve security.With a bug free website, no excuse for the customer to finalize the command.

module.name: cartasixpay
module.description: CartaSi X-Pay is a payment gateway that allows you to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: CartaSi X-Pay is a payment gateway that allows you to accept online payments.
module.additional_description: With X-Pay you have:a complete offer of integrated payment methods: - transaction management for Visa, Mastercard, Visa Electron, V-Pay, Maestro, American Express, Diners international schemes - acceptance of every type of Wallet: MySi, Masterpass e PayPala multichannel platform, granted by a checkout page that is optimized for mobile, tablet e desktop and by compatibility with merchant's app through SDK packages for Android and IOSa simple and intuitive payment interface, designed to improve customer's purchase experience, offering several possibilities of online payment (Easy checkOut, Recurrent Payments, OneClickPay)functionality to accept payments from all over the world. - customers can pay in euros or other currencies, with a guaranteed exchange rate, thanks to Dynamic Currency Conversion (DCC) service.protection and security of all payment transactions. Use of cryptographic protocols SLL-TSL, 3D procedure and CVV2 security codes. X-Pay is also compliant to PCI-DSS standardMaximum flexibility and customization -merchant e-commerce logo on payment page -payment page integrated on the e-commerce website without having to handle the sensitive customer data thanks to a customizable interface (iframe o lightbox) -100% Customizable Checkout thanks to Hosted Fields -Possibility to change interface's language when paying with CartaSiavailability of integration with merchant's working environment -Configuration of the cash mode: immediate, deferred, total or partial -Integration through API with merchant's website to handle the orders directly - advanced reporting (transaction profiling of customers, management of receipts, cancellations and Refunds, contracts Management for recurring payments) -business continuity: X-Pay guarantees constant operativeness, with no service interruptionschoosing the current account to which transfer payments for online transactions commercial assistance and specialized technical support   For more informations https://ecommerce.cartasi.it

module.name: pspixel
module.description: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Set up the official Facebook Pixel module to reach new potential customers and easily analyze the activity and performance of your shop!
module.additional_description: Use the Facebook pixel with your Prestashop website to:   -          Measure the results of your ads: Understand sales that resulted from your Facebook campaigns using Facebook ads reporting. -          Reach the right people: Find new customers and optimize your ads for people who are more likely to make a purchase by creating custom audiences. -          Show the right products: Automatically create ads that showcase your products, or use dynamic ads to retarget your site visitors with relevant ads based on what they browsed on your website

module.name: mtarget
module.description: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS mo
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the power of the SMS to reassure your clients and increase your sales!Sales status, shopping basket reminder, birthdays or Marketing Cible campaigns, give your shop an extra breath with our SMS module.
module.additional_description: Strengthen your client relations and increase your sales thanks to our handy and simple SMS sending solution. Inform your clients in real time of the progression of their purchaseRemind them of their current shopping basketCommunicate efficiently on all your events (sales, private sales, …)Segment and synchronize automatically your contacts on our platformBe informed by SMS about any new subscriptions, new orders and purchases or return demandsFollow and analyse the results of your campaignsManage your budget (no subscription, no hidden costs)After sale services and support based in FranceLowest price on  the market

module.name: gestpay
module.description: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The official Gestpay’s (www.gestpay.it) plugin for PrestaShop enables you to accept any form of payment supported by Banca Sella Group’s payment gateway.
module.additional_description: GestPay is the solution that allows to maximize your e-commerce conversions, thanks to the customization of the platform by integrating functions that also optimize the customer user experience. It is possible to accept payments by credit and debit card and over 200 alternative payment methods, with the security of an evolved fraud prevention system built upon artificial intelligence technologies.

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required.
module.additional_description: Did you know that most of your shop visitors leave without any interaction?Optimize your traffic with fully-automated personalized product recommendations and excite your customers with the right products at the right time. Your customers will thank you with much higher conversion rates up to 4 timesadditional revenue up to 20 %an improved average order value Start now with the Recolize Plug & Play solution for free.Success-based pricing: after 1.000 clicks on recommendations for free each month you pay only 0,039 € per click.

module.name: match2one
module.description: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Match2One will help you find new customers online, by placing ads across 1000's of relevant websites in front of people who are likely to become your next customer.  No minimum investments, no signups fees and is easy to use.
module.additional_description: By connecting Match2One to your website, the platform will automatically learn about your online audience - where to find new customers online, and target people who have visited your site. You can sit back and relax, Match2One’s optimisation engine will automatically make intelligent choices for you. If you’re looking for an advertising tool that will help you get more new customers, you’ve come to the right place. Find new customers → A Prospecting campaign tracks, analyses data from your webshop and uses this to find similar customers online. This will help you drive more traffic and increase your sales.Convert more visitors → Retargeting converts visitors into buyers. Generally 2-3% of shoppers convert on the first visit to an online store. Retargeting brings back the other 97%. Retargeting works by tracking people who visit your site and showing your ads to them as they visit other sites online.
